name: A bit more than Plants vs. Zombies (Alpha)
name_original: A bit more than Plants vs. Zombies (Alpha)
description:
Welcome to the neighborhood! Here in Suburbia we have really sunny days, a radiant blue sky and of course your occasional zombie.

🌱The game is controlled by using the mouse.
🌱Right  click to deselect when planting or shoveling.
🌱The "Exit" button and the "Retry" button needs to be double clicked.
✨(DEV KEY: " - " shows wave numbers and enables 3x speed)

🛑(In the state the game is right now, there is only one level)

I hope you like this little homage to Plants vs. Zombies

More updates soon!
